topic.title: Bitcoin
topic.body: Discuss Bitcoin - anything goes but try to limit price discussion charting crap.. It's boring.

1535697542_12H7WVVjVfiug4YJ3zcMnTzbbKSWf.body: So I'm starting a new youtube channel here on zeronet to discuss bitcoin and how it plays into the current state of chaos we find ourselves in.  Keep checking http://127.0.0.1:43110/149EPBN4hQRpwj5TcoPETepnoXHCUXzaCN/?Channel=12H7WVVjVfiug4YJ3zcMnTzbbKSWf8Uk7g channel bitcoingeek

1534470841_1Kh3qLdTH2QKewUb6cWZa2dMveMT5.body: can we have nitemode gui for zero talk? That would make it better

21053_1KbV1e1u6P6AsY8XNBydgtbtN8iSB5WMyG.body: I'd rather see empowering things than things about war and religious conflict.

1535211258_1P4KkC3wa5xtGD8m2MoBTf5p69G3X.body: use dreamweaver with ur files why won't that work? seems easy enough.

1533957797_1Bcm7BpVuYsQaE8wGB8CrLWzef32r.body: ANSWER: spam transactions are gone! Thanks Roger AND Jihan
